User-agent: *

# /.well-known/ contains domain verification
# stuff like Discord, etc.  Best not to have
# search engines indexing it, as it is useless!
Disallow: /.well-known/

# /google*.html is Google Search Console verification
# files!  We don't need nor want search engines to index them.
Disallow: /google*.html

# 404 page does not need to be indexed!
Disallow: /404.html

# Use a sitemap, generated by jekyll-sitemap.
# Added: April 25, 2024 at 2:15pm
Sitemap: https://www.alphagame.dev/sitemap.xml
